title: What is Amazfit X? How can I order it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Amazfit X is the latest wearable from the Xiaomi-backed brand called Huami, and this one has quite a few things going for it. ... Huami's new offering comes with the usual set of fitness-centric features, such as 24x7 heart rate tracking, sleep monitoring, and also the ability to measure blood oxygen levels… currently unavailable because of lockdown
